Subject: Odd logging behavior...
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=6903103
X-Yahoo-Profile: tree02139

I started a crawl last night using 0.10.0 (with my Accept-Header
patch) over a seed list containing 8 URLs.

When I checked progress this morning, my machine was out of disk
space. Checking the console showed me that only 4 documents had been
downloaded. Egads. Investigation shows that the heritrix log file was
over 150G (yes, gigabytes), which is what ate up my disk.

Suffice it to say I was a bit non-plussed by this.

Did logging verbosity increase tremendously in 0.10.0?

Has anyone else seen very verbose logging going on?

I'm going to try to reproduce this, but I thought I'd ping the list to
see if anything like this is happening to others.

    -tree
